articles.author: Evan Comen
articles.title: This Is the City in Every State With the Most COVID-19 Cases - 24/7 Wall St.
articles.description: The U.S. has reported more than 32.1 million confirmed COVID-19 cases as of May 6. More than 572,000 Americans have died of COVID-19 — the highest death toll of any country. The virus has spread throughout the country in a way that has been difficult to predi…
articles.content:

articles.author: DTSrija
articles.title: Brazil eyes new Pfizer deal next week for 100 million more COVID-19 shots - DTNEXT
articles.description: Brazil expects to sign a new deal next week with Pfizer Inc for 100 million more COVID-19 vaccine doses, a Health Ministry official said on Friday, which would double the U.S. drugmaker's delivery to the Latin American country this year.

articles.title: Partnership with Microsoft will help preserve local languages, says FG - TheCable
articles.description: The federal government says it engaged Microsoft, an American multinational technology company, to help use machine learning and artificial intelligence in preserving local languages.
